caption.p: Synthetic routes to compounds 33, 47–50. Reagents and Conditions: (a) NaH, DMF/THF, 4-bromomethylpyridine, RT; 20%; (b) K 2CO 3, THF, benzaldehyde, RT-60 °C; 40% (c) NaH, (CH 3) 3SOI, DMSO, RT; 33–64%; (d) LiOH, THF/MeOH/H 2O, 100 °C; 25–89%; (e) MeOH, piperidine, paraformaldehyde, pTSA, toluene, 100%; (f) proper heterocycle, CHCl 3, Et 3N, RT; (g) t-BuOK, THF, benzaldehyde, RT; 11–38%;
